creator: antonio.petrelli@gmail.com
text:
Two problems:

1. The "oracle.sql" file does not work, has syntax errors.

2. The "supportsGetGeneratedKeys" does not work as expected under Oracle, because it returns a ROWID object. An overridden user property would suffice to fix the problem.

Created attachment 24072
Patch for ConnectionSourceSkeleton class and "oracle.sql" file

I attached the patch, that includes the one for the 47600 bug:
https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=47600
creator: antonio.petrelli@gmail.com

text: Fix committed to trunk in svn r821364
